name: Lovely Runner
description: Im Sol travels back in time to prevent the tragic fate of her favorite star, Ryu Sun Jae.

name: Stranger Things
description: A group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits.

name: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys toward his destiny in a turbulent world.

name: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' plans the biggest heist in recorded history.

name: The Crown
description: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

name: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped contestants accept an invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize, but the stakes are deadly.

name: Queen of Tears
description: A gripping tale of love, loss, and resilience set against the backdrop of a war-torn nation.

name: Alice in Borderland
description: A gamer and his friends find themselves in a parallel Tokyo, where they must compete in dangerous games to survive.

name: Crash Landing on You
description: A South Korean heiress accidentally crash-lands in North Korea and meets a North Korean officer who decides to help her hide.

name: Peaky Blinders
description: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centered on a gang who sew razor blades into their caps.

name: All of Us Are Dead
description: Students trapped in a high school during a zombie virus outbreak must fight for survival.

name: Extraordinary Attorney Woo
description: A brilliant young attorney with autism faces challenges and discrimination in the courtroom and in life.

name: Dark
description: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes hidden secrets.

name: My Demon
description: A cold-hearted heiress and a powerless demon enter into a contract marriage full of supernatural surprises and love.

name: Vincenzo
description: A Korean-Italian mafia lawyer returns to Korea and takes on a corrupt conglomerate using his own unique methods.
